entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Friday 24 March 2023
